column1: virginia castleberry. dec 7, 1936 - jun 11, 2015 castleberry - virginia castleberry, age 78 of suwanee passed away on thursday june 11, 2015. memorial services will be held at a later date. mrs. castleberry is survived by: son: earl castleberry, cumming
column11: and mary jane shelly. please leave online condolences at stewartfh. com.
